name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_SEARCH_RN
description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_SEARCH_RN table contains information about the areas that the scrub person searched.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_SEARCH_AREAS_SCRUB_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for the areas that the scrub person searched.
